title: omgitsmehehe
author: omgitsmehehe
content: Earning money online is far superior to working at a physical establishment during the day. Although offline is highly appreciated and difficult. Trading is a great approach to find your true self. It will put everything to the test, including your greed, emotions, patience, discipline, how you handle failure, control, common sense, and resolve. I strongly advise anyone who is going through a terrible time in their life to learn to trade since it provides them a clear sense of purpose other than waiting for jobs. So, which is better, online or offline?

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Trading is a good way to lose, especially for people that have just started. For some people that continues to trade, some among them continue to lose. Trading is not a means to make incomes, expect you follow the somethings. Things like:Not using more than what you can afford to lose. Unless you have tested your strategy for months and not failing.Using amount lower than what you can afford to lose to startBe disciplinedTrading not taking your time and becoming problem for your health.Trading is easy to talk about, but to win consecutive is another thing which only very few traders are good at. Most traders are losing. Just accept that, because it is the truth.

comments.author: Ultegra134
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on May 16, 2023, 05:21:23 PMTrading is a good way to lose, especially for people that have just started. For some people that continues to trade, some among them continue to lose. Trading is not a means to make incomes, expect you follow the somethings. Things like:Not using more than what you can afford to lose. Unless you have tested your strategy for months and not failing.Using amount lower than what you can afford to lose to startBe disciplinedTrading not taking your time and becoming problem for your health.Trading is easy to talk about, but to win consecutive is another thing which only very few traders are good at. Most traders are losing. Just accept that, because it is the truth.I think your statement regarding trading is a little too bold. Indeed, trading can lead to capital loss, which is expected with any kind of investment or trading strategy. However, trading also provides great opportunities that can yield unrealistic results, depending on your trading style, in a few days, or you can go the safer route of choosing more trusted and established coins. As you've also briefly mentioned, it's certainly not suited for everyone. Personally, I'm way too anxious and can't stand the whole scenario; thus, I decided to stop after a while. Truth be told, I made a decent sum of money in a relatively short period of time.From my point of view, I believe that it's an experience that everyone should try at least once or twice and judge for themselves if it's worth it.

comments.author: safar1980
comments.body: Quote from: omgitsmehehe on May 16, 2023, 05:01:13 PMEarning money online is far superior to working at a physical establishment during the day. Although offline is highly appreciated and difficult. Trading is a great approach to find your true self. It will put everything to the test, including your greed, emotions, patience, discipline, how you handle failure, control, common sense, and resolve. I strongly advise anyone who is going through a terrible time in their life to learn to trade since it provides them a clear sense of purpose other than waiting for jobs. So, which is better, online or offline?I think that a beginner will lose his capital in a few months or less if he uses margin trading. How many years did you learn to trade and what are your successes now?What exchanges do you use for trading and do you have enough income not to work offline?

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: If they are learning how to trade without even having something they are already earning from, who will cater to their needs then? Who will even give them money to invest after they start trading gradually and encourage some losses?Quote Earning online more preferable than offline?Regarding your topic, cryptocurrency is not even the only online means of earning; there are people monetizing their social media accounts; some are doing a lot of tutorials and funny stuff online that earns them money; some do digital marketing; and many more, but those things still require a lot of experience, patience, and critical thinking for people to earn money online. Learning how to trade really takes time to learn and master a good trading strategy that can earn them a profit. Also, it's not very good to rely on only one means of income.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: Quote from: omgitsmehehe on May 16, 2023, 05:01:13 PMI strongly advise anyone who is going through a terrible time in their life to learn to trade since it provides them a clear sense of purpose other than waiting for jobs. So, which is better, online or offline?I don't quite agree with this idea for someone in a terrible state to run into trading as a rescue or solution. No to such because what do you expect to happen when you trade without the right emotions and someone going through terrible times obviously won't have a balance state of mind. So it is better for such people to heal before going into trade To have the assumption that trading is a sure means to financial breakthrough is wrong and that will lead to repeated loses. Have another job if possible while combining with trade because no continuous profit, you lose and you win.

comments.author: AnonBitCoiner
comments.body: These days getting job is not an easy task so therefore people are engaged in online jobs and investment in these online jobs is one of the best option. The benefit of online jobs is that you can do it anywhere like setting at home so you don't have any need to go anywhere at a Constant place.Other thing is that if a person having job but his salary is not enough to manage the needs of his family so he can do online job so in such way he will easily earn income to use in daily circumstances as well as he can also save some part of it for future.Offline job is good in the case that it has certainty of getting income but online jobs does not have but as offline jobs are difficult to find therefore trading in investment as online jobs are the better option with maximum profit.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Online job however is not for all. Some people couldn't last an hour in front of a monitor. While you wanna test your limits in learning trading skills and see how it works out, you're going to find out what you're made of in tough times such as a long bear market. This will indeed test your emotions, discipline, and resolve. Offline jobs are always available, people today have 2-3 jobs to survive. One person I know has to borrow my bike to show up at his 2nd job where he throws the thrash of the residents in a building apartment. This is their resolve.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: omgitsmehehe on May 16, 2023, 05:01:13 PMEarning money online is far superior to working at a physical establishment during the day. Although offline is highly appreciated and difficult. Trading is a great approach to find your true self. It will put everything to the test, including your greed, emotions, patience, discipline, how you handle failure, control, common sense, and resolve. I strongly advise anyone who is going through a terrible time in their life to learn to trade since it provides them a clear sense of purpose other than waiting for jobs. So, which is better, online or offline?Well, to be honest trading is far more dangerous than those offline jobs. If someone is not aware of the risks of the trading then that person can lose the full capital without any warnings. In spot trading most of the exchanges don't even warn the users even if their capital is 99% down. I remember the time when Terra Luna went down more than many 1000's of percent in value. People who were holding the coin at the time lost everything and their money went form 100's million into few thousand dollars. Trading and holding of crypto-currencies is a very risky thing and those who aren't aware of such risks would end up trading the coins that can go down anytime.Many people fall into the trap of pump and dump coins, those useless coins are pumped just to create greed in the minds of the traders and once a trader spots such unbelievable pumps they fall badly into such traps and end up loosing most of their portfolio. Aside form the risks., I also agree that a good trader can earn substantial income from trading. The skill is hard to master but once someone learns is very well then it can be a path to riches for the best traders. Someone live a happy life with the earnings that they generate through trading.

comments.author: freedomgo
comments.body: Quote from: omgitsmehehe on May 16, 2023, 05:01:13 PMEarning money online is far superior to working at a physical establishment during the day. Although offline is highly appreciated and difficult. Trading is a great approach to find your true self. It will put everything to the test, including your greed, emotions, patience, discipline, how you handle failure, control, common sense, and resolve. I strongly advise anyone who is going through a terrible time in their life to learn to trade since it provides them a clear sense of purpose other than waiting for jobs. So, which is better, online or offline? Trading has certainly its own advantages and disadvantages as well. Though it’s giving us a great income every time our trades became successful but always know that there is no guarantee that you’ll be making the same profits everyday. You’ll be trading and make significant profits today but maybe by tomorrow you’ll start losing them again slowly. So the risk of losing is still high most particularly if you’re a beginner trader that lacks knowledge and skills in trading. For me, trading is a good side hustle but it can never be reliable enough as your main source of income.

comments.author: Finestream
comments.body: Quote from: palle11 on May 16, 2023, 06:03:41 PMQuote from: omgitsmehehe on May 16, 2023, 05:01:13 PMI strongly advise anyone who is going through a terrible time in their life to learn to trade since it provides them a clear sense of purpose other than waiting for jobs. So, which is better, online or offline?I don't quite agree with this idea for someone in a terrible state to run into trading as a rescue or solution. No to such because what do you expect to happen when you trade without the right emotions and someone going through terrible times obviously won't have a balance state of mind. So it is better for such people to heal before going into trade To have the assumption that trading is a sure means to financial breakthrough is wrong and that will lead to repeated loses. Have another job if possible while combining with trade because no continuous profit, you lose and you win. This makes really sense. You’ll only be in trouble if you trade having your emotions not stable as it will only ruined your trades and lost your focus in your goal because your emotions will overrule your own right thinking. Losses will be more visible than gains. So never trade if you have this state of mind. Control your emotions first and fix it before you can say that trading will give you significant profits more than what you can earn from a decent and stable job.

comments.author: KingsDen
comments.body: Quote from: omgitsmehehe on May 16, 2023, 05:01:13 PMEarning money online is far superior to working at a physical establishment during the day. Although offline is highly appreciated and difficult. Trading is a great approach to find your true self. It will put everything to the test, including your greed, emotions, patience, discipline, how you handle failure, control, common sense, and resolve. I strongly advise anyone who is going through a terrible time in their life to learn to trade since it provides them a clear sense of purpose other than waiting for jobs. So, which is better, online or offline?It is correct to say that crypto currency trading makes us to get acquainted with the reality of life. A good trader should know how to manage his emotions, also a good trader should be patient and should know how to handle failure. In as much as trading teaches us all these attributes and we use them in our daily endeavour, but the major purpose of venturing into crypto currency trading is not to test our emotions, our ability to withstand failure. Its sole purpose is to make money. Then, while making money, we can leverage on the other benefits that trading give to us to shaping our life. Coming back to the title of your article. It is not every online earning that is better than offline. There are some offline earnings that are very steady and reliable than online earnings.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: Quote from: omgitsmehehe on May 16, 2023, 05:01:13 PMEarning money online is far superior to working at a physical establishment during the day. Although offline is highly appreciated and difficult. Trading is a great approach to find your true self. It will put everything to the test, including your greed, emotions, patience, discipline, how you handle failure, control, common sense, and resolve. I strongly advise anyone who is going through a terrible time in their life to learn to trade since it provides them a clear sense of purpose other than waiting for jobs. So, which is better, online or offline?On what source or proof you are making this statement? i am not objecting to your statement because it's totally legit and i totally agree with it, in fact, i recently wrote about the importance of BTC for youth, and how BTC made poor ones millionaires in less time. While those who work daily and work from 9 to 5 can not become millionaires as Traders can make. Because it provides us with the luxury of independence and sovereignty. We can earn while enjoying our life. We can think out of the box which we can't do in offline jobs because there is less room to grow. But still many intend to join that offline job life. Even sometimes i also thought it as a necessary part of my life. Why?Reason depends on many factors, like in my surroundings, most of the people focused on real work (offline work) (i am not saying it they say it). Even, they will not support you or encourage you to shift to this online work because they think of it as a time waste until you started to make money, they change their minds. But, i also agree on one point that if we have succeeded in any way of earning money and living our life, whether it is from online or offline sources, we have to grow and diversify our investment, Because, recently, there were 5 to 6 days internet breakdown in our whole country and we have faced hell lot of loss in IT sector, even the freelancers have faces hell lot of loss even the most famous freelancing platform Fiverr has disabled the GIGs for Pakistani which has left us jobless and helpless too. We can't do a thing we are all dependent on them. In these cases, physical work comes handy, you know you have a backup job to do which will make you enough money so that you don't have to worry anymore. This mindset will take you to the heights of mountains because Plan B is necessary with Plan A.

comments.author: SquirrelJulietGarden
comments.body: Quote from: omgitsmehehe on May 16, 2023, 05:01:13 PMEarning money online is far superior to working at a physical establishment during the day. Although offline is highly appreciated and difficult.Many people don't want to return to offices for working but I don't think working online completely is good or perfect.Offline jobs can help us to build personal connections, in person, face to face that is good for our psychology. It can help us to reduce our time on computer and good for our eyes, mental, reduce stress effects from using computer too much. It is good for our spiral, hands too.QuoteTrading is a great approach to find your true self. It will put everything to the test, including your greed, emotions, patience, discipline, how you handle failure, control, common sense, and resolve.If you think trading is easy to be a work for everyone, you are naively. Most of traders lose money with trading rather than earning more money from trading. Trading is very stressful too.

comments.author: Texac
comments.body: the advice could not be worse because trading is not for everyone, do you see how many people have succeeded and become wealthy through trading, especially newbies? currently, the economic situation is precarious, making money with traditional occupations faces many difficulties, but that does not mean that we give up our traditional jobs and go to trade.  That's really bad advice, and if someone is going to do it, it's a stupid idea. by the way, have you become rich by trading? I will be glad if you can provide proof.

comments.author: worle1bm
comments.body: Quote from: Texac on May 17, 2023, 05:00:03 AMthe advice could not be worse because trading is not for everyone, do you see how many people have succeeded and become wealthy through trading, especially newbies? currently, the economic situation is precarious, making money with traditional occupations faces many difficulties, but that does not mean that we give up our traditional jobs and go to trade.  That's really bad advice, and if someone is going to do it, it's a stupid idea. by the way, have you become rich by trading? I will be glad if you can provide proof.If you have in mind that we can become rich by trading easily then we are on the wrong side because you need lot of experience,skills and also face loss in your trading journey.You see people earning good and also doing promotions that you can also earn good but don't follow them blindly as it's hard to time the market because lot of analysis is there to make decent profits.So learn with time and for earning you need experience and skills then it's easy whether online or offline.

comments.author: bettercrypto
comments.body: Nowadays, earning online is really becoming a trend. Just here in our country, online dropshipping is becoming rampant now that only requires a small amount of capital, that's the battle now, in addition to that even on social media platforms that are different such as Facebook, Youtube, Instagram and others can be used as a source of income.      These are the things that we will see now more and more - especially being influencers. almost anyone can become influencers because they see that they can make money, so whatever content they do, even if it's ridiculous, shameful, in exchange for income, it's fine with them like that and even here in cryptocurrency trading online so it's not that easy to do in reality.

comments.author: skarais
comments.body: Quote from: omgitsmehehe on May 16, 2023, 05:01:13 PMEarning money online is far superior to working at a physical establishment during the day.Don't be angry, you can't come to a conclusion like that if you don't talk about a particular type of job when you compare them.I can tell you that selling snacks like French fries, or snacks or something like that has a much bigger turnover than other types of formal jobs that pay a monthly salary to their employees. They can make $1000 - $5000 every month depending on how central their business position is.But of course things like this can be compared from job to job and it also depends on who they are. Content creators like YouTubers can make a lot of money, but I think even street vendors can make a commensurate profit from this business. I might agree that during a pandemic this type of online work is much preferable, but that won't limit someone from having another physical business.

comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: A day job is no substitute for trading. Earning online is not equal to trading, please don't make this confusion. There are many day jobs which are done online and they provide a stable income. Trading is not a stable but risky method of making money considering the market movements and the trades are placed. I would not recommend members to leave their job and go for trading, that is a foolish move to make.Simply speaking, the chances of losing money are more common with trading for an inexperienced person.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: I think making money online or offline requires hard work and effort because if you don't take it seriously, you won't be able to make any money. But making money online or offline has advantages and disadvantages that we must know to find ways to reduce the risk.Trading might be one way to make money online, but it's not as easy as one might imagine because you have to have expertise in analysis. And working in a physical company during the day is the same. So you must determine it yourself and focus on work to make money.
